description: This file defines the ApiClient class which configures and exposes a Dio HTTP client for API requests, including interceptors for authentication and logging.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A class that encapsulates the configuration of a Dio HTTP client with interceptors for authentication and logging, used for making API requests.

methods.name: ApiClient
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the Dio client with base options, including timeout and headers, and adds interceptors for authentication and logging.

methods.name: dio
methods.description: Getter method that returns the configured Dio instance.
